DPF4Publish.UserExitBeforeValidate.COMMENT:
DON'T EDIT THIS PROCESS.
Customize the process name called instead in server/dpf/conf/dpf4publish/publish.customer.ini with keyword DPF4Publish.UserExitBeforeValidate.
Use internal process names.
DPF4Publish.UserExitBeforeValidate.NAME: User Exit Before Validate
